title: Home | Consumer Protection Agency
description: We are an organization focused on protecting consumers from all aspects of financial pitfalls. We provide ongoing financial education and a path through our financial literacy program ranging from teens to adults. We work with and for consumers protecting their rights by applying the law.

hero.title: Consumer Protection Agency
hero.text: Helping people and businesses improve their financial health.

text.p: We are an organization focused on protecting consumers from all aspects of financial pitfalls. We provide ongoing financial education and a path through our financial literacy program ranging from teens to adults. We work with and for consumers protecting their rights by applying the law.
